data.title: The UN just declared antibiotic resistance “the greatest and most urgent global risk".

It's almost impossible to get an abortion in Ireland — but that could change soon: 1000s of Irish women each yr must travel outside the country — most to the UK — for an abortion. 1000s expected to gather in cities around world today to protest in favor of abortion rights for Irish women.
